name: StartPlaying.Games
headline: Building Communities Through Play
description: ✨ Hello! ✨ - StartPlaying.Games is the largest marketplace for finding game masters to host digital tabletop games like D&D. Today, more than 40 million people play D&D around the world and sales have grown by double-digit percentages for the last five consecutive years. But still finding people to host and play these games with is challenging. Most solutions involve digging through discord servers, reddit, and specialty forums. We built StartPlaying.Games to solve this problem.

founders.name: Nathaniel Tucker, Founder
founders.description:
Nate is the founder of StartPlaying.Games (SPG). SPG is the largest marketplace for hiring professionals to run online tabletop games like D&D. 

Nate founded SPG after graduating from Harvard and working at Goldman Sachs, Facebook and Google. As CTO he bootstrapped an AI-based mutual fund sales advisory startup to profitability and lead a big data genomics company to acquisition.

# StartPlaying
Dung|
#### Tabletop RPGs Run by Professional Game Masters
[Find game](https://startplaying.games/</search>)
### What is StartPlaying?
StartPlaying is the largest online platform for players to find tabletop roleplaying games and professional GMs for any game system and any virtual tabletop! Are you looking to play D&D Online or find a virtual Pathfinder 2e group? We're part D&D Group finder (amongst other games) and part games finder. Our professional dungeon masters and Game Masters are running games all over the world. Find a game that works for you and your schedule.
[See all](https://startplaying.games/</search>)
##### Browse Popular TTRPG Systems
Browse 100s of tabletop roleplaying games run by professional Dungeon Masters. Find your favorite TTRPG system and start playing online today!
[Browse All Game Systems](https://startplaying.games/</play>)
##### Browse Popular Dungeons & Dragons Adventures
Explore all of Dungeons and Dragons adventure modules, from Curse of Strahd to Vecna: Eve of Ruin! Find your perfect adventure and start playing DnD online today!
[Browse All Adventures](https://startplaying.games/</dnd>)
#### Our Benefits
###### Never played before?
If you're new to Dungeons & Dragons and other RPGs, our experienced professional Dungeon Masters and Game Masters are happy to introduce you to the game so you and your friends can learn to play D&D online.
###### How much does it cost?
That depends, each GM lists their own price. You can view each game's price when browsing games.
###### What are the Games like?
Love combat? Enjoy roleplaying? Excited by puzzles? Our Game Masters offer games of all play styles. StartPlaying makes it easy to find a D&D group that matches your play style.
###### Where do I play?
Currently, all of our games are online, but eventually, we will support finding local D&D games and other TTRPGs near you as well. If you're looking to play D&D online we have over 1000 professional dungeon masters ready to run your adventure.
###### Hosting a team event?
We've run team events for some of the coolest companies in the world! Check out our [corporate games page](https://startplaying.games/<https:/startplaying.games/blog/team-building>) and book an event for your team!
###### What if I don't have a group?
No worries, join a game solo and play with other players! StartPlaying is the largest RPG table finder for games run by professional dungeon masters and game masters. Over 20,000 players have found their online D&D group with us. Whether you wanna play D&D online with a pro-GM, or any other TTRPG, StartPlaying has you covered.
#### Check out our Game Masters
[Browse All Game Masters](https://startplaying.games/</gm-search>)
###### How to Play Dungeons & Dragons Online
Featured guides from the blog
[![Dungeons & Dragons Essentials](https://startplaying.games/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fhome%2Fdragon.jpg&w=640&q=75)Dungeons & Dragons EssentialsRead More](https://startplaying.games/</blog/posts/dungeons-and-dragons-resources>)
[![Learn To Play D&D Online](https://startplaying.games/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fhome%2Fhow_to_play.jpg&w=640&q=75)Learn To Play D&D OnlineRead More](https://startplaying.games/</blog/posts/how-to-learn-to-play-d-d-online>)
[![Everything You Need To Play D&D Online](https://startplaying.games/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fhome%2Feverything_you_need.jpg&w=640&q=75)Everything You Need To Play D&D OnlineRead More](https://startplaying.games/</blog/posts/everything-you-need-to-play-d-d-online>)

#### Become a Game Master
Join 100s of other Professional Game Masters
Learn More
###### Team Building Events
Collaborative, multiplayer, social experiences hosted by professional game masters. Bring your team together for an unforgettable virtual bonding experience. No prep necessary! Our events work for teams of any size and are designed to be fun and memorable. Book a call today to talk about your next team event with StartPlaying.
[Learn More](https://startplaying.games/<https:/startplaying.games/blog/team-building>)

generated_description:
### StartPlaying.Games: Connecting Communities through Tabletop Play

Founded in 2020 and hailing from the San Francisco Bay Area, **StartPlaying.Games** emerged as a solution to a common dilemma faced by tabletop role-playing enthusiasts—finding reliable game masters for online games. Originally called "Hello!", the platform quickly established itself as the largest marketplace for players seeking professional game masters for tabletop games like Dungeons & Dragons (D&D) and Pathfinder.

The mission of StartPlaying is straightforward: **Building Communities Through Play**. With over **40 million D&D players** globally and a notable steady increase in sales for five years running, the demand for organized, engaging gaming experiences continues to grow. Yet, players often find themselves sifting through various forums and social media platforms—like Discord and Reddit—to connect with fellow gamers. StartPlaying simplifies this process, providing a streamlined venue to find and book games.

StartPlaying operates entirely online, and while it currently boasts a small team of six, its impact is substantial. The platform allows users to browse hundreds of tabletop RPG systems and find games that suit their style (combat, roleplaying, puzzles—you name it). Players unfamiliar with the genre can also find experienced Dungeon Masters ready to guide them into the action.

Pricing is determined by the individual game masters, making access to various game types flexible and tailored. Additionally, StartPlaying enables players to join existing games solo if they lack a group, facilitating connections among fans.

Beyond casual play, StartPlaying caters to corporations seeking engaging team-building exercises. Their services have been employed by innovative companies looking to provide fun and memorable experiences for their employees.

For anyone interested in embarking on a thrilling adventure or hosting engaging gaming events, StartPlaying.Games is your go-to resource. You can check them out at [StartPlaying.Games](https://startplaying.games/). Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice eager to dive in, StartPlaying fosters the sense of community that is essential to the tabletop gaming experience.
